location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Government of India, Simla to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter, dated 2 July 1873 regarding a letter by Pelly's predecessor (Colonel John Cheape Brook) on the levying of Octroi taxes in the Nusseerabad [Nasīrābād] cantonment and detailing the objections to this before requesting Pelly's advice on any ways in which the town can be separated from the cantonment in order to avoid difficulties.A note below the letter, dated 20 July, records that a copy of the letter had been dispatched to Leslie Saunders.
